sen.j: 高 師世（こうのもろよ、? - 正平 (日本)6年/観応2年2月26日 (旧暦)（1351年3月24日））は、南北朝時代 (日本)の武将。
sen.e: KO no Moroyo (year of birth unknown - March 24, 1351) was a Japanese military commander who lived during the period of the Northern and Southern Courts.

sen.e: Moroyo entered the priesthood with Moronao and Moroyasu when Takauji and Tadayoshi became reconciled to each other, but he and other family members including Moronao and Moroyasu were killed by the Uesugi clan at Mukogawa.
